video_identification.title: Dry Lands, Deep Courage: Co-Resisting Water Apartheid in the Jordan Valley

extracted_metadata.title: Dry Lands, Deep Courage: Co-Resisting Water Apartheid in the Jordan Valley
extracted_metadata.description: On Wednesday, August 20th, the AFCFP and Combatants for Peace community gathered for "Dry Lands, Deep Courage: Co-Resisting Water Apartheid in the Jordan Valley" â€” a conversation with Palestinian and Israeli CfP activists working together to defend the basic human right to water. This event was part of our summer campaign, Emergency Assistance, Shared Resistance.
